Types

tAccordion

TYPE tAccordion RECORD <anonymous wc_jqaccordion R3>
    
field STRING
title STRING
narrative STRING
sections DYNAMIC ARRAY OF tSection
END RECORD

tSection

TYPE tSection RECORD <anonymous wc_jqaccordion R1>
    
name STRING
content STRING
END RECORD

Functions

Collapsible

FUNCTION Collapsible(r_acc tAccordion, p_collapse BOOLEAN)

Set whether the accordion is independently collapsible or not

 call wc_jqaccordion.Collapsible(TRUE)

Parameters:
r_acc -
p_collapse - Collapsible if TRUE

Create

FUNCTION Create(p_field STRING) RETURNS tAccordion

Creates a new instance of jqAccordion

 define r_acc wc_jqaccordion.tAccordion
 call wc_jqaccordion.Create("formonly.p_jqaccordion") returning r_acc.*

Parameters:
p_field - Form name of the field
Returns:
Accordion record

Icons

FUNCTION Icons(r_acc tAccordion, p_closed STRING, p_open STRING)

Set icons for open and closed states See https://api.jqueryui.com/resources/icons-list.html

 define r_acc tAccordion
 ...
 call wc_jqaccordion.Icons(r_acc.*, "ui-icon-folder-open", "ui-icon-folder-collapsed")

Parameters:
r_acc - tAccordion record
p_closed - Name of JQuery-UI icon for closed state
p_open - Name of JQuery-UI icon for open state

Init

FUNCTION Init()

Initialize

 call wc_jqaccordion.Init()

Serialize

FUNCTION Serialize(r_accordion tAccordion) RETURNS STRING

Serialize an accordion structure

 define r_acc tAccordion,
   p_json string
 let p_json = wc_jqaccordion.Serialize(r_acc.*)

Parameters:
r_accordion - Accordion instance
Returns:
JSON string of accordion structure
